title: Bug 18705 - Too much flashing in Control Example
description: The bug report lacks sufficient details.
OB: The software displays excessive flashing during certain actions or operations.
EB: The software should only repaint the bottom edge of the outermost frames.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the Control Example.
2. Perform actions or operations that trigger repainting.
3. Observe the excessive flashing.
